Seller, shipping, and buying option details
✦ NEW EDITION 2025 ✦ 🇲🇽 🇪🇸 Ready to Read, Write, and Speak Spanish in Just 30 Days? 🇲🇽 🇪🇸

❗With over 100,000 copies sold and over 1,000 positive reviews across platforms, the NEW 2025 Edition has been enriched with 8 New Bonuses to improve your learning experience.
Say “Adiós” to lengthy learning hours, as our science-based method inspired by strategies from polyglots (who speak 5+ languages fluently), integrates 15-minute lessons tailored for adults on a hectic schedule, and easy-to-digest chapters to facilitate memorization.

Here's what you'll get:
Book 1: Learn The Essential Grammar Rules You'll Ever Need, with:
Short, well-structured lessons designed to reach a CEFR-Level A2 (pre-intermediate) of language proficiency!
50+ effective yet simple exercises that will turbocharge your Spanish writing skills, helping you progress quickly.
The 10% of the language you'll use 90% of the time in real-life conversations, no pointless memorization.
Book 2: Elevate Your Conversation Skills for Seamless Interactions, with:
600+ easy-to-memorize Spanish words and indispensable phrases tailored for your everyday life.
Everyday words and phrases to become comfortable in any situations: navigating, restaurants, shopping..
Understanding the nuances between European and South American Spanish, common words and slang.
Book 3: Immerse in Interactive Content to Boost Your Language Skills, with:
Authentic and engaging Short Stories + real-life dialogues that reflect everyday situations.
Vocab lists highlighting the most crucial words in each story to enrich your vocabulary.
A clear pronunciation guide to effortlessly sound like a native speaker.
To summarize: You’re getting this value-packed Spanish learning bundle that includes:
A modern science-based method to fast-track you to Spanish fluency
Tons of additional content to enhance your learning experience, scroll down to learn more.
See, this isn’t just another workbook to read (and possibly dump!) – it's a 360° journey specially crafted to meet all your needs and fast-track your progress.

Scroll up, Click 'Buy Now' to join our 5,000+ students and kickstart your journey to fluency today. See you inside! DISCLAIMER: This book is entirely human-made, without any involvement of artificial intelligence (AI) tools or algorithms.
Follow authors to get new release updates, plus improved recommendations.

Speak Abroad Academy was formed by an international group of teachers and travel enthusiasts with a passion for foreign languages. Seeing first-hand how learning a new language can break down barriers and create powerful human connections, we’ve made it our mission to help others embrace the same opportunities.

Unimpressed by the boring, overly-difficult books on the market today, we set out to create exactly what was missing: language books that aren’t just effective, but actually fun to read! You see, we know from experience that learning languages can be enjoyable and exhilarating – but you’d never know it from your run-of-the-mill language textbook.

Speak Abroad Academy aims to offer something exciting and wildly different. With us, learning languages can be the true adventure it was always meant to be. You’ll develop mastery over grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, writing, reading, and more. And to sweeten the deal — along the way, we’ll even give you smart, practical advice that actually prepares you for the real world.
So come join us on this journey! Learning a new language has never been this easy.

node.content-desc: Learn Spanish: Grammar Workbook for Adult Beginners: Master Spanish in No Time with 15-Minute Daily Lessons, Practical Exerci

node.text: Learn Spanish: Grammar Workbook for Adult Beginners: Master Spanish in No Time with 15-Minute Daily Lessons, Practical Exerci

This comprehensive bundle is jam-packed with useful words and phrases. You’ll learn to describe yourself, other people, places, express your feelings, and much more – so you can start speaking real, conversational Spanish with a CEFR-level A1 of language proficiency.
LEVEL-UP FAST WITH 15-MIN A DAY PRACTICE

Learn Spanish the easy way with easy-to-learn 15-Minute lessons and interactive beginner level exercises. Spanish grammar rules will start to feel like second nature. Learn the 10% you'll use 90% of the time in conversations, no pointless memorization.
ENGAGING SHORT STORIES YOU’LL ACTUALLY ENJOY

Reading stories is one of the most universally effective ways of learning a new language. And in this book, Spanish short stories aren’t just educational; they’re also wildly entertaining, so you never get bored. Start improving your Spanish while you’re having fun.

Equip yourself with real-world Spanish phrases that you can use on-the-go, anytime. Whether you’re dining out, shopping, or making plans with friends, these handy phrases make it easier to express whatever you need to say. Follow the in-built pronunciation guide and you’ll sound just like a native, too.

node.content-desc: Customer reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 848 global ratings

node.text: Customers find this Spanish workbook teaches the basics effectively and is easier to follow than videos and apps. The content is well-organized and presented in a clear, non-intimidating manner, with engaging exercises that make learning fun. They appreciate the bonus content and consider it good value for money. The print size receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting the text is too small.
